nodes.text: Used by the famous Gand findsmen to herd their prey, the Gand shockstaff was a powerful weapon in which its stunning capability was backed up by its sharp tip. While not too powerful in a combat situation, it did deliver an electrical bonus.
This weapon is usually found as loot from the Gand Findsman in the Jekk'Jekk Tarr on Nar Shaddaa.
